reviewtext: 2 words, YOU BET!!!I was having a problem with my newly installed cable TV.I had light and dark horizontal bands that would come and go, mostly come.I had read that the splitters cable companies use are cheap and unsatisfactory.I decided to spend a few extra dollars and go for the Monster 2 Gig 4 way splitter.I installed the splitter and VIOLA! no more bands, perfect picture!I also use Monster Video 2 coxial cable for the connection from the wall to the splitter and from the splitter to my DVD recorder.If your picture quality is lacking and you're on the fence not wanting to fork out a few extra bucks, believe me it is definitely worth it.
summary: Monster 2 Gig splitter is it worth it?
